Text.Language: Ariv~meui P[oic m~pianjwj n~te penkahi pekbwk.
Remember, O Lord, the ruler of our land, Your servant.
Ten]ho ouoh tentwbh n~tekmeta~gayoc pimairwmi: a~riv~meui P[oic m~pianjwj n~te penkahi pekbwk.
We ask and entreat Your Goodness, O Lover of Mankind: remember, O Lord, the ruler of our land, Your servant.
نسألُ ونطلبُ من صلاحِكَ يا مُحبَ البشرِ، اذكر ياربُ رئيسَ ارضِنا عبدَكَ.
Twbh hina n~te Vnou] t/iten n~hannai nem hanmetsenh/t m~pem~yo n~niexoucia etamahi: n~tefermalazin m~pouh/t e~qoun e~ron e~piagayon n~c/ou niben: n~tef,a nennobi nam e~bol.
Pray that Christ our God may give us mercy and compassion before the mighty sovereigns, and soften their hearts towards us, for that which is good at all times, and forgive us our sins.
اطلبوا لكى يعطينا المسيحُ الهنا رحمةً ورأفةً امامَ الرؤساءِ الأعزاءِ، ويعطفَ قلوبَهُم علينا بالصلاحِ فى كلِّ حينٍ، ويغفرَ لنا خطايانا.
Areh e~rof qen ouhir/n/ nem oumeym/i nem oumetjwri: marou[~nejwou naf n~je nibarabaroc nieynoc n/eyouws n~nibwtc: p~roc y/e~te ywn t/rou n~euyenia.
Keep him in peace, truth and strength. Subject under him all the barbarians, the nations who desire war against all our fertile (lands).
احفظه فى سلامٍ وعدلٍ وقوةٍ، وتُخضِع له كلَّ البربرِ، الامم الذين يريدون الحربَ فى جميعِ ما لنا من الخصبِ.
Caji e~q~r/i e~pefh/t eybe ]hir/n/ n~te tekoui~ m~mauatc eyouab n~kayolik/ n~a~poctolik/ n~ekk~l/cia.
Speak to his heart concerning the peace of Your One, Only, Holy, Catholic and Apostolic Church.
تَكَلمْ فى قلبِه من اجلِ سلامِ كنيستِكَ الواحدةِ الوحيدةِ المقدسةِ الجامعةِ الرسوليةِ.

M/ic naf e~meui~ n~hanhir/nikon e~qoun e~ron nem e~qoun e~pekran eyouab: hina a~non hwn enwnq qen oubioc efhourwou ouoh efwrf: n~cejemtom ensop qen meteuceb/c niben nem metcemnoc niben e~qoun e~rok qen pih~mot.
Give him that he may think peacefully towards us and towards Your holy name, that we too may lead a quiet and peaceable life, and may be found in all piety and all chastity in You.
اعطه ان يفكرَ بالسلامِ فينا وفى اسمِكَ القدوسِ، لكى نعيشَ نحنُ ايضاً فى سيرةٍ هادئةٍ، ونوجدَ ساكنينَ بكلِّ تقوى وكلِّ عفافٍ بِكَ.
